# Music by Code Project Instructions

## Project Overview
- **Name**: Music by Code
- **Creator**: Promise Nwhator
- **Framework**: Astro
- **Purpose**: Showcase coded music built with Tone.js

## Tech Stack
- Astro (Static Site Generator)
- Tailwind CSS (Styling)
- Tone.js (Audio Synthesis)
- JavaScript/TypeScript

- [ ] Create Library page
- [ ] Create example songs
- [ ] Create Studio page (bonus)
